responseText: I mean no offense, traveler, but you look like you just stepped off of the potato wagon. You should find a place to settle down, at least for a few days. Maybe find some friends to show you around. The Striders watch the roads, but you can't count on us to always be around, do you follow? Not my concern end-of-day, but if I had just been flung into an entirely unfamiliar world I'd at least pay some heed to the advice of the people living there. That's just me though.
name: SQ_Lionhold_Clotharmor_Timony_4_Response
